ygData.subject: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/16/99 4:06:49 PM Mountain Daylight Time, uber_sorcerer@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/16/99 4:06:49 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
uber_sorcerer@... writes:

<< was sitting lost all Stam down to 1 bubble and ppl on the boat kept
disappearing >>

Greetings,

I took my first boat ride the other night and also noticed stamina dropping.
Hmmm, also sounded like perhaps I was swimming? Ok, so I got up and walked
around till that strange sound stopped. Stamina started picking up. Sat
down. Stamina started dropping again. Finally realized that it didn't
matter where I sat, sitting just plain drained my Stam.

People disappearing, yes. Very strange. Could just be graphics glitch? I
was in a party with a friend and we were in group speak so can't comment on
/say. But it was a little disturbing to see your partner sitting there one
second and then vanishing right before your eyes. But because of opinion on
this and other lists, I refrained from singing on the boat at all. Far be it
for me, little lowly 6.5 songstress, to be the cause of a boat crash! LOL

I am enjoying the sage and experienced words of our higher level brothers and
sisters. But where are the young ones such as myself? The tales and
adventures I read here are things I won't be seeing for some time to come.
Are there any others in the 5th to 10th season with advice and knowledge to
share as well? Let's speak up and help each other with similar questions. I
have questions as well which I will post later (time for work!).

Calliope of Freeport
6th Season Half Elf Bard
